name: aesyros-suite

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "align,catalyst,foresight,pulse,flow" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan" "npm run dev:align" "npm run dev:catalyst" "npm run dev:foresight" "npm run dev:pulse" "npm run dev:flow"
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/dist && rm -rf packages/*/dist
scripts.fresh: npm run clean && npm install && npm run install:all
scripts.preview: concurrently -n "align,catalyst,foresight,pulse,flow" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan" "npm run preview:align" "npm run preview:catalyst" "npm run preview:foresight" "npm run preview:pulse" "npm run preview:flow"

description: Aesyros Suite - Strategic Operating System for modern organizations
